sentences.en: An artist's easel or drawing board.
sentences.cn: 那种画家用的画架或是绘图板.

sentences.en: And then the screen frame just fits in frame on easel, it turns into screen frame.
sentences.cn: 然后银幕边框与画架上的画框重合, 画框变成银幕边框.

sentences.en: At the same time, it oppugned on trueness which was pursued by Easel Art.
sentences.cn: 同时, 也对“架上艺术”所追求的“真实”提出了质疑.

sentences.en: He paused in the middle of folding up his easel.
sentences.cn: 他画架收到一半,却停了下来.

sentences.en: I learned easel or studio picture was a form developed during the Renaissance.
sentences.cn: 我知道画室画源于文艺复兴时期.

sentences.en: I took it from the easel and held it up to the windows.
sentences.cn: 我把画从画架上取下来,把它举到窗户前.

sentences.en: I'll set up my easel and paint a masterpiece!
sentences.cn: 我会将画架摆好并画出一幅佳作!

sentences.en: In this room you can also find Aleksandr's easel and palettes.
sentences.cn: 在这个房间你也可以发现亚历山大的画架和调色板。

sentences.en: In this room you can also find Aleksandr’s easel and palettes.

sentences.en: Selectie deliery of substances including gelfoam particles, polyvinyl alcohol , and stainless steel coils achieethe easel.

sentences.en: These results provide fundamental basis for optimization of the planet easel.
sentences.cn: 为行星架的优化设计提供了重要的依据.

sentences.en: This is a well designed easel which folds up quickly and neatly.
sentences.cn: 这个画架设计得很好,可以迅速而整齐地折叠起来.

trans.tran_en: a wooden frame that you put a painting on while you paint it
